channel.title: Gke on VS tech corner
channel.description: Recent content in Gke on VS tech corner

item.title: Using GKE with multiple accounts and clusters
item.description: Google cloud configs Download and install gcloud Simply follow this link Listing existing configurations gcloud config configurations list NAME IS_ACTIVE ACCOUNT PROJECT DEFAULT_ZONE DEFAULT_REGION This should give you only one line, with a default account. Creating a configuration gcloud config configurations create testconf This will guide you through the configuration of a new configuration. It allows you to set one config per account, project, cluster… Activating a configuration gcloud config configurations activate testconf As simple as this to change your account/config.
